016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.client;
017
018import com.codahale.metrics.MetricRegistry;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.client.api.DnsLookup;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.client.providers.DnsLookupService;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.client.ClientConfiguration;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.client.ReactiveStreamsClient;
024import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.common.LocalStreamFactories;
025import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.common.ReactiveStreamsAbstractService;
026import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.spi.MessageReader;
027import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.spi.MessageWorkers;
028import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.spi.MessageWriter;
029import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.util.FutureProcessor;
030import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
031import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
032import org.eclipse.jetty.client.HttpClient;
033import org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.client.WebSocketClient;
034import org.reactivestreams.Publisher;
035import org.reactivestreams.Subscriber;
036
037import java.lang.reflect.Type;
038import java.net.URI;
039import java.util.List;
040import java.util.Optional;
041import java.util.concurrent.CancellationException;
042import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
043import java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList;
044import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
045import java.util.function.Supplier;
046
047public class ReactiveStreamsClientService
048        extends ReactiveStreamsAbstractService
049        implements ReactiveStreamsClient {
050
051    private final ReactiveStreamsClientConfiguration clientConfiguration;
052    private DnsLookup dnsLookup;
053    private MetricRegistry metricRegistry;
054    private final Supplier<LocalStreamFactories> reactiveStreamsServerServiceProvider;
055    private final WebSocketClient webSocketClient;
056
057    private final List<FutureProcessor<Object>> activeSubscriptions = new CopyOnWriteArrayList<>();
058
059    public ReactiveStreamsClientService(Configuration configuration,
060                                        MessageWorkers messageWorkers,
061                                        HttpClient httpClient,
062                                        DnsLookupService dnsLookup,
063                                        MetricRegistry metricRegistry,
064                                        Supplier<LocalStreamFactories> localStreamFactoriesProvider,
065                                        Logger logger) throws Exception {
066        super(messageWorkers, logger);
067        this.dnsLookup = dnsLookup;
068        this.metricRegistry = metricRegistry;
069        this.reactiveStreamsServerServiceProvider = localStreamFactoriesProvider;
070
071        clientConfiguration = new ReactiveStreamsClientConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("reactivestreams.client"));
072
073        WebSocketClient webSocketClient = new WebSocketClient(httpClient);
074        webSocketClient.setStopAtShutdown(false);
075        webSocketClient.setIdleTimeout(clientConfiguration.getIdleTimeout());
076        webSocketClient.setConnectTimeout(clientConfiguration.getConnectTimeout().toMillis());
077        webSocketClient.setAutoFragment(clientConfiguration.isAutoFragment());
078        webSocketClient.setMaxTextMessageSize(clientConfiguration.getMaxTextMessageSize());
079        webSocketClient.setMaxBinaryMessageSize(clientConfiguration.getMaxBinaryMessageSize());
080        webSocketClient.setMaxFrameSize(clientConfiguration.getMaxFrameSize());
081        webSocketClient.setInputBufferSize(clientConfiguration.getInputBufferSize());
082        webSocketClient.setOutputBufferSize(clientConfiguration.getOutputBufferSize());
083        webSocketClient.start();
084        this.webSocketClient = webSocketClient;
085    }
086
087    @Override
088    public CompletableFuture<Void> publish(URI serverUri, String streamName, Supplier<Configuration> subscriberServerConfiguration,
089                                           Publisher<?> publisher, Class<? extends Publisher<?>> publisherType, ClientConfiguration publisherClientConfiguration) {
090
091        if (publisherType == null)
092            publisherType = (Class<? extends Publisher<?>>) publisher.getClass();
093
094        MessageWriter<Object> eventWriter = null;
095        MessageReader<Object> resultReader = null;
096
097        if (serverUri != null) {
098            Type type = resolveActualTypeArgs(publisherType, Publisher.class)[0];
099            Type eventType = getEventType(type);
100            Optional<Type> resultType = getResultType(type);
101
102            eventWriter = getWriter(eventType);
103            resultReader = resultType.map(this::getReader).orElse(null);
104        }
105
106        return publish(serverUri, streamName, subscriberServerConfiguration, publisher, eventWriter, resultReader, publisherClientConfiguration);
107    }
108
109    @Override
110    public CompletableFuture<Void> publish(URI serverUri, String streamName, Supplier<Configuration> subscriberServerConfiguration, Publisher<?> publisher, MessageWriter<?> messageWriter, MessageReader<?> messageReader, ClientConfiguration publisherClientConfiguration) {
111
112        CompletableFuture<Void> result = new CompletableFuture<>();
113
114        if (serverUri == null) {
115            LocalStreamFactories.WrappedSubscriberFactory subscriberFactory = reactiveStreamsServerServiceProvider.get().getSubscriberFactory(streamName);
116
117            if (subscriberFactory != null) {
118                // Local
119                org.reactivestreams.Subscriber<Object> subscriber = subscriberFactory.factory().apply(subscriberServerConfiguration.get());
120                FutureProcessor<Object> futureProcessor = new FutureProcessor<>(result);
121                result.whenComplete((r, t) ->
122                        {
123                            activeSubscriptions.remove(futureProcessor);
124                        }
125                );
126                futureProcessor.subscribe(subscriber);
127                publisher.subscribe(futureProcessor);
128                activeSubscriptions.add(futureProcessor);
129                return result;
130            } else {
131                result.completeExceptionally(new IllegalArgumentException("No such subscriber:" + streamName));
132                return result;
133            }
134        } else {
135            if (!("ws".equals(serverUri.getScheme()) || "wss".equals(serverUri.getScheme()) || "srv".equals(serverUri.getScheme()))) {
136                result.completeExceptionally(new IllegalArgumentException("URI scheme " + serverUri.getScheme() + " not supported. Must be one of 'ws', 'wss', or 'srv'"));
137            }
138        }
139
140        FutureProcessor<Object> futureProcessor = new FutureProcessor<>(result);
141        result.whenComplete((r, t) ->
142                {
143                    activeSubscriptions.remove(futureProcessor);
144                }
145        );
146        publisher.subscribe(futureProcessor);
147        activeSubscriptions.add(futureProcessor);
148
149        // Start publishing process
150        if (messageReader != null) {
151            new PublishWithResultReactiveStream(
152                    serverUri, streamName,
153                    publisherClientConfiguration,
154                    dnsLookup,
155                    webSocketClient,
156                    futureProcessor,
157                    (MessageWriter<Object>) messageWriter,
158                    (MessageReader<Object>) messageReader,
159                    subscriberServerConfiguration,
160                    byteBufferPool,
161                    metricRegistry,
162                    result);
163        } else {
164            new PublishReactiveStream(serverUri,
165                    streamName,
166                    publisherClientConfiguration,
167                    dnsLookup,
168                    webSocketClient,
169                    futureProcessor,
170                    (MessageWriter<Object>) messageWriter,
171                    subscriberServerConfiguration,
172                    byteBufferPool,
173                    metricRegistry,
174                    result);
175        }
176        return result;
177    }
178
179    @Override
180    public CompletableFuture<Void> subscribe(URI serverUri, String streamName, Supplier<Configuration> publisherConfiguration,
181                                             Subscriber<?> subscriber, Class<? extends Subscriber<?>> subscriberType, ClientConfiguration subscriberClientConfiguration) {
182
183        if (subscriberType == null)
184            subscriberType = (Class<? extends Subscriber<?>>) subscriber.getClass();
185
186        Type type = resolveActualTypeArgs(subscriberType, Subscriber.class)[0];
187        Type eventType = getEventType(type);
188        Optional<Type> resultType = getResultType(type);
189
190        MessageReader<Object> eventReader = getReader(eventType);
191        MessageWriter<Object> resultWriter = resultType.map(this::getWriter).orElse(null);
192
193        return subscribe(serverUri, streamName, publisherConfiguration, subscriber, eventReader, resultWriter, subscriberClientConfiguration);
194    }
195
196    @Override
197    public CompletableFuture<Void> subscribe(URI serverUri, String streamName, Supplier<Configuration> publisherConfiguration,
198                                             Subscriber<?> subscriber,
199                                             MessageReader<?> messageReader,
200                                             MessageWriter<?> messageWriter,
201                                             ClientConfiguration subscriberClientConfiguration) {
202        CompletableFuture<Void> result = new CompletableFuture<>();
203
204        if (serverUri == null) {
205            LocalStreamFactories.WrappedPublisherFactory publisherFactory = reactiveStreamsServerServiceProvider.get().getPublisherFactory(streamName);
206
207            if (publisherFactory != null) {
208                // Local
209                Publisher<Object> publisher = publisherFactory.factory().apply(publisherConfiguration.get());
210                FutureProcessor<Object> futureProcessor = new FutureProcessor<>(result);
211                result.whenComplete((r, t) ->
212                        {
213                            activeSubscriptions.remove(futureProcessor);
214                        }
215                );
216                activeSubscriptions.add(futureProcessor);
217                futureProcessor.subscribe((Subscriber<? super Object>) subscriber);
218                publisher.subscribe(futureProcessor);
219                return result;
220            } else {
221                result.completeExceptionally(new IllegalArgumentException("No such publisher:" + streamName));
222                return result;
223            }
224        } else {
225            if (!("ws".equals(serverUri.getScheme()) || "wss".equals(serverUri.getScheme()) || "srv".equals(serverUri.getScheme()))) {
226                result.completeExceptionally(new IllegalArgumentException("URI scheme " + serverUri.getScheme() + " not supported. Must be one of 'ws', 'wss', or 'srv'"));
227            }
228        }
229
230        FutureProcessor<Object> futureProcessor = new FutureProcessor<>(result);
231        result.whenComplete((r, t) ->
232                {
233                    activeSubscriptions.remove(futureProcessor);
234                }
235        );
236        activeSubscriptions.add(futureProcessor);
237        futureProcessor.subscribe((Subscriber<? super Object>) subscriber);
238
239        // Start subscription process
240        if (messageWriter != null) {
241            new SubscribeWithResultReactiveStream(
242                    serverUri, streamName,
243                    subscriberClientConfiguration,
244                    dnsLookup,
245                    webSocketClient,
246                    futureProcessor,
247                    (MessageReader<Object>) messageReader,
248                    (MessageWriter<Object>) messageWriter,
249                    publisherConfiguration,
250                    byteBufferPool,
251                    metricRegistry,
252                    LogManager.getLogger(SubscribeReactiveStream.class),
253                    result);
254
255        } else {
256            new SubscribeReactiveStream(
257                    serverUri, streamName,
258                    subscriberClientConfiguration,
259                    dnsLookup,
260                    webSocketClient,
261                    futureProcessor,
262                    (MessageReader<Object>) messageReader,
263                    publisherConfiguration,
264                    byteBufferPool,
265                    metricRegistry,
266                    LogManager.getLogger(SubscribeReactiveStream.class),
267                    result);
268        }
269        return result;
270    }
271
272    public void preDestroy() {
273
274        // Close existing streams
275        logger.info("Cancel subscriptions on shutdown");
276
277        // Cancel all subscriptions
278        for (FutureProcessor<Object> activeSubscription : activeSubscriptions) {
279            activeSubscription.close();
280        }
281
282        // Wait for them to finish
283        for (FutureProcessor<Object> activePublisherSubscription : activeSubscriptions) {
284            try {
285                activePublisherSubscription.getResult().get(10, TimeUnit.SECONDS);
286                logger.debug("Subscription closed");
287            } catch (CancellationException e) {
288                // Ignore, this is ok
289            } catch (Throwable e) {
290                logger.warn("Could not shutdown subscription", e);
291            }
292        }
293
294        logger.info("Shutdown reactive streams client");
295        try {
296            webSocketClient.stop();
297        } catch (Exception e) {
298            logger.warn("Could not stop websocket client", e);
299        }
300    }
301}
